footer.aboutEtsyTitle: About Etsy Global Merchant Alliance Platform
footer.aboutEtsyContent:
I. Platform Overview
1. Global E-commerce Ecosystem
The Etsy Global Merchant Alliance Platform is a comprehensive e-commerce ecosystem connecting creative artisans, independent designers, and consumers worldwide. We are committed to providing professional sales and promotion platforms for handcrafted items, vintage goods, and creative designs.

Platform Features:
‚úîÔ∏è Global Operations: Covering 200+ countries and regions
üîç Smart Matching: AI-driven product recommendation system
üåê Multilingual Support: Supporting 15 major languages
üîí Security Assurance: Bank-level data encryption and payment security
üõçÔ∏è Quality Guarantee: Strict merchant certification and product quality inspection
üë®‚Äçüíª Technological Innovation: Virtual reality product display technology

2. Merchant Service System
We provide comprehensive service support for global merchants:
üõí Store Management: One-stop store operation tools
üí∞ Financial Services: Multi-currency settlement and financing support
üöÄ Marketing Promotion: Precise advertising and traffic support

III. Contact Information
üìç Global Operations Center: Marina Bay Financial Centre, Singapore
üìß Business Cooperation: alliance@etsy.com
‚òéÔ∏è Customer Service Hotline: +65-6000-8888 (24-hour multilingual service)

Review Support: Our professional team provides merchants with product review, quality inspection, and compliance guidance services.

company.companyStat1Label: People earning Cash Back with Rakuten
company.companyStat4Label: Average Cash Back per member in 2024
company.homeBannerDesc: Get Cash Back at 3,500+ stores, restaurants, travel bookings and more. Join and watch your Cash Back add up.
company.step1Desc: Sign up and start shopping. Shop on Rakuten.com, download the browser extension or get the app.
company.step2Desc: As you shop on store sites, Cash Back adds up in your account. How? Stores pay us for sending them shoppers and we share that cash with you.
company.step3Desc: Blockchain global settlement for faster transactions
company.imgCard1Title: We've paid members over $3.6 billion in Cash Back
company.imgCard1Desc: There's a reason we're the #1 Cash Back shopping companion. Don't believe us? Just ask our community of 21+ million members.
company.imgCard2Title: More for you, all with Cash Back
company.imgCard2Desc: Earn on everything from clothes and electronics, to restaurants and ride-sharing. We'll find you deals on more brands, apps and services so you can shop easy.
company.imgCard3Title: Shop whenever you want, however you want
company.imgCard3Desc: Shopping smarter doesn't have to be harder. Start with Rakuten via desktop, the App or our extension and let us do the deal-finding for you.
